com.linecorp.armeria.common.http

Interface HttpHeaders

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Headers<AsciiString,java.lang.String,HttpHeaders>, HttpObject, java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<AsciiString,java.lang.String>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpHeaders

    public interface HttpHeaders
extends HttpObject, Headers<AsciiString,java.lang.String,HttpHeaders>
    HTTP/2 headers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static HttpHeaders EMPTY_HEADERS
      An immutable empty HTTP/2 headers.

      default HttpHeaders asImmutable()
      Returns the immutable view of this headers.

      Returns new HTTP headers with a single entry.

      • iterator

        java.util.Iterator<java.util.Map.Entry<AsciiString,java.lang.String>> iterator()
        Returns an iterator over all HTTP/2 headers. The iteration order is as follows: 1. All pseudo headers (order not specified). 2. All non-pseudo headers (in insertion order).
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Headers<AsciiString,java.lang.String,HttpHeaders>
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<AsciiString,java.lang.String>>
